answers.answer: 13 wks. When I went for the gestational diabetes.

The ultrasound person told me he guessed it was a boy at 13 weeks 1 day when I went in for my NT test. Then when I had my anatomy scan at 19 weeks 5 days it was confirmed he was a boy. I had another ultrasound at 30 weeks 1 day and he is still a boy. :)
♡ thx Hopefully I'll get an ultrasound next week .... I'll b 14 weeks 2 days
